line.words: Mwen pase devan yon kafe restoran, yon pak ak yon sinema, yon moun ap suiv mwen.

line.words: Mwen vire adwat devan yon boutik, agoch devan biwo lapòs la. Gen yon rivyè devan m, gen yon moun k ap suiv mwen.

line.words: Mwen travèse yon pasaj pyeton anfas mize a, touprè legliz la, dèyè lekòl la, gen yon moun k ap suiv mwen.

line.words: Mwen mache ak zanmi m yo touprè estasyon tren an. To pran tren, kamyonèt oswa taksi. Mwen kontinye poukont mwen a pye, epi gen yon moun k ap suiv mwen.

line.words: Toudwat devan m, nan nan viraj la, lwen de lakay mwen, mwen retounen. Mwen di “Bonjou mimi. Pito m menmen ou lakay mwen. Demen, mwen kwè m ap pran kamyonèt.”

subtitle.line: Straight ahead, on the corner, far from home I turn around. “Hello puss,” I say. I better take you home. Tomorrow I think I am going to go by bus.
